Goal Representation: ['1. Find a cup and fill it with milk.', '2. Place the cup of milk in the microwave and heat it.']

def find_cup(cup:item):
    # Determine if there is a known cup
    symbol has_cup=exists c: item : is_cup(cup)
    return has_cup

def has_milk_on_kitchen(milk:item):
    # Determine if there is milk in the kitchen
    symbol has_milk=exists kitchen: item : is_kitchen(kitchen) and inside(milk, kitchen)
    return has_milk

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind cup: item where:
            is_cup(cup)
        # Select a cup
        
        bind milk: item where:
            is_milk(milk) and has_milk_on_kitchen(milk)
        # Select milk in the kitchen

        achieve inside(milk, cup)
        # Fill the cup with milk
['1. Get a cup and pour milk into it.', '2. Place the cup of milk in the microwave and heat it.']

behavior clean_and_fill_cup_with_milk(cup:item, milk:item):
    body:
        achieve clean(cup) # Ensure the cup is clean
        achieve_once inhand(cup) # Temporarily hold the cup
        achieve inhand(milk) # Take the milk

def has_faucet(sink:item):
    # Determine whether this sink has a faucet
    symbol has_faucet=exists faucet:item: is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet,sink)
    return has_faucet

behavior clean_and_prepare_milk(cup:item, milk:item, sink:item):
    body:
        # The cup must be clean before filling it with milk
        achieve_once clean(cup)
        if has_faucet(sink):
            bind faucet: item where:
                is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet,sink)
            achieve_once is_on(faucet) # Turn on faucet if available
            rinse(cup) # Rinse the cup
            achieve_once is_off(faucet) # Turn off the faucet after
        else:
            rinse(cup) # Clean the cup as best as possible

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind cup: item where:
            is_cup(cup) and clean(cup)
        # Ensure the selected cup is clean
        bind milk: item where:
            is_milk(milk)
        # Select the milk item
        bind sink: item where:
            is_sink(sink)
        # Select the sink
        clean_and_fill_cup_with_milk(cup, milk)
        # Ensure the cup is clean and fill it with milk
['1. Pour milk into a cup.', '2. Heat the cup of milk in the microwave.']

def is_filled(cup:item):
    # Determine if the item has milk poured into it
    symbol filled=exists milk:item: is_milk(milk) and inside(milk, cup)
    return filled

behavior pour_milk_into_cup(milk:item, cup:item):
    body:
        achieve inside(milk, cup)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind milk: item where:
            is_milk(milk)
        # Bind the milk item

        bind cup: item where:
            is_cup(cup)
        # Bind the cup item

        if not is_filled(cup):
            pour_milk_into_cup(milk, cup)
            # Pour milk into the cup if its not already filled

def inside_microwave(cup:item, microwave:item):
    # Function to check if a cup is inside the microwave
    symbol inside_microwave=exists room: item : is_microwave(room) and inside(cup, microwave)
    return inside_microwave

def is_heat_mode_available(microwave:item):
    # Function to check if the heat mode is available for the microwave
    return True # This assumes the microwave has a heat mode it may be prechecked manually

behavior heat_in_microwave(cup:item, microwave:item):
    body:
        achieve inside(cup, microwave) # Place the cup inside the microwave
        achieve closed(microwave) # Close the microwave
        if is_heat_mode_available(microwave):
            achieve is_on(microwave) # Turn on the microwave to heat

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind cup: item where:
            is_cup(cup)
        # Select a cup
        bind microwave: item where:
            is_microwave(microwave)
        # Select a microwave, assuming theres only one or the environment defines which to use
        heat_in_microwave(cup, microwave) # Heat the cup in the microwave
